body.raw:
## Introduction

```bash
npm install @zuude-ui/cropper
```

## Usage

```tsx
<Cropper src="" />
```

## Props

| Prop              | Type                   | Default |
| ----------------- | ---------------------- | ------- |
| `size`            | `"sm" \| "md" \| "lg"` | `"md"`  |
| `crop`            | `object`               | -       |
| `onCropChange`    | `function`             | -       |
| `className`       | `string`               | `""`    |
| `showGrid`        | `boolean`              | `true`  |
| `showBehindImage` | `object`               | -       |

## Examples
